Title: Delays in nuclear plant restarts could support French gas and LNG demand depending on weather
Description: Strikes delayed the restart of several French nuclear reactors including those previously planned to restart this winter to ensure France's security of supply. Before the strikes, abnormally low nuclear availability this year had already supported demand for gas and LNG, a trend which could continue for the rest of the year depending on the weather
Author: DE

Title: Vessels delayed at Nigeria’s Bonny LNG export plant
Description: The arrival of two vessels at Nigeria’s Bonny LNG liquefaction plant was delayed and a third vessel was cancelled. The plant has been operating at limited capacity since declaring force majeure last week due to flooding in the region affecting LNG production and supply
Author: DE

Title: Mozambique's Coral South LNG plant unloads its first export cargo
Description: Mozambique's Coral South floating LNG export plant is unloading its first export cargo. This marks the start of commercial operations at Mozambique's first LNG plant and adds the country to the list of LNG exporters
Author: DE
